summary: BRAKE PEDAL GOES TO THE FLOOR OR FIREWALL WHEN BRAKING. THE BRAKES SEEMED TO GET BETTER BUT  CONDITION RETURNED. THIS BACK AND FORTH HAS HAPPENED TWICE BUT NOW THE BRAKE AREN'T GETTING BETTER. ALL OF THESE BRAKING SITUATIONS ARE HAPPENING ON CITY STREETS HIGHWAYS, TURNING ALL WHILE IN MOTION. LINCOLN MKX 2013.  *TR
